title: 'Overall a good product'

title: 'Good'

title: 'Only the keyboard is good'
body: Keyboard is good and brand new, but mouse is not good, doesn't feel comfortable and it seems like already used one, had scratches when I received it.

title: 'value for money.'
body: 'This product is suitable for this purpose
column5: but the mouse is a bit small and may not fit well for people with large hands.'

title: 'Worth it'
body: 'The keys are really smooth . Both the mouse and keyboards are very good.'

title: 'Responsiveness & Build Quality'
body: 'Build Quality üí™ Responding Much better than other options'

title: 'An excellent keyboard if you are on a budget'
body: 'I always prefer wired keyboards over wireless ones. They are a bit inconvenient but they are sure to work every time. Smooth keys. And in addition no need to change batteries. HP brand of this keyboard is an added merit'

title: 'Go for it without second thoughts!'
body: Keys are super comfortable! There is no height adjustment! But doesn't matter. Keys are so good !

title: 'Good quality'
body: 'so nice keyboard is very silent and simple keyboard very good keyboard'

title: 'typing this review from the same keyboard.'
body: 'very comfortable to type without any noise and mouse scroll has rough surface which gives grip while scrolling. connected to HP laptop both mouse and keyboard working like butter..'

title: 'VERY SHORT USB CABLE. NOT SUITABLE FOR DESKTOPS'
body: 'The cable length is very short for keyboard and mouse and it is suitable only for laptop not for desktop as the cable will not be enough.'

title: 'Value for money'
body: 'This pair of the wired keyboard and mouse of HP 150 has good finish. Keys are soft. Just plug-in and start using.'

title: 'Poor quality'
body: 'Sometimes keys are functioning properly. Cord length is very short.'

title: 'silent keys
column5: 'I have used many keyboards including MXkeys and mouse including the MX3. But the wireless ones either have issues of battery or sometimes sluggishness.  hence got converted back to the wired connection for my desktop / laptop stand. The keyboard has absolutely silent operation and very responsive. the LED light is a tad bright though. the mouse is very accurate too and doesnt have any lags or start up issues.. and all this at a fraction of cost of the MX series. lets see about the longitivity though.'

title: 'Silent soft keys. Adjustable slope not available'
body: 'After tired of using wireless keyboard ( better replacements
column5: delay in response ) I have bought this wired one. Keys are soft and silent. Mouse quality is normal  As mentioned in description 6 degree adjustable slope is not available'

title: 'Good Buy'
body: 'Product is working good. But Mouse and keyboard wire is very thin and have a concern about the durability.'

title: 'Item quality is good but cable size is very small'
body: 'Not bad ... Cable size is small looking good'

title: 'HP 150 wired Keyboard not working properly.'
body: 'This HP Keyboard was not working properly since it was put to use. I have a ASUS Laptop purchased 10 years back. Laptop Keyboard gave up 5 years back. Since then I have been using external keyboard (TVS Champ) which stop functioning 1 month back. Then I have decided to purchase this HP 150 Wired Mouse and Keyboard Combo by spenfing Rs.757/-. I expected good result but it failed to provide the same and very recently I found that presssing any key it open up new screen and it become impossible to do any work with my laptop. Today after struggling for 32 days with this HP 150 Keyboard I finally purchased Dell Multimedia Keyboard (KB216) which has been working perfectly okay.'

title: 'As per discussion slope is not adjustable'
body: 'As per discussion slope is not adjustable. Also return window is closed :( so unable to return.'

title: As per the price it's good.
body: 'Keyboard -  Keys are soft and silent Weight is light Looks premium  Mouse Mouse looks little inferior Looks ok Works fine  Brought this combo for 700'

title: 'Below par'
body: 'Keyboard is good. Mouse is disappointing. It is small
column6: scrolling is not smooth. Got it for 849.'

title: Item didn't last more than 10days.
body: 'Some of the keys of the keyboard stopped working after using it for 10days. Lodged a complaint with HP
column5: but they failed to get it attended or replaced the product.'
